title: Test Matrix Expansion: skill-local and repo-level v4 coverage
description:
Expand and reconcile test coverage for skill package and repository-level skill tests.

Test surfaces
1) Skill-local tests
- skills/beadboard-driver/tests/*
2) Repo-level tests
- tests/skills/beadboard-driver/*

Required additions
- contract tests for updated command matrix assumptions,
- lifecycle tests for non-interactive v4 flow,
- failure-mode tests for newly documented error codes/remediations,
- script output schema assertions for preflight/readiness tools.

Gate
- ensure all existing skill tests still pass after v4 migration.

Files
- skills/beadboard-driver/tests/*
- tests/skills/beadboard-driver/*
acceptance_criteria: Skill v4 behavior is covered by updated local and repo tests, including non-interactive flow, failure remediations, and output schema assertions.
